entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
